mapper.select:
SELECT well_id wellId, well_region wellRegion, init_stratum_pres initStratumPres, init_saturation_pres initSaturationPres, test_pres testPres, pres_rate presRate, creator , create_time createTime FROM oilwell_pressure_underground WHERE well_id = #{queryParam.wellId} and well_region = #{queryParam.wellRegion}
AND (create_time between #{queryParam.startDate} and #{queryParam.endDate} )
SELECT distinct well_region from oilwell_pressure_underground where well_region is not null
SELECT distinct well_id from oilwell_pressure_underground where well_region= #{oilRegion}
